title: Number of visitors to Zion National Park in the U.S. 2008 to 2019
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of visitors in millions, containing a total of 12 data points.
In general Number of visitors in millions has rose over the Year.

Number of visitors in millions is roughly constant from 2008 to 2010, roughly increasing from 2010 to 2011, roughly decreasing from 2011 to 2012, rapidly increasing from 2012 to 2016, and lastly roughly constant from 2016 to 2019.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2015 and 2016.
The highest Number of visitors in millions, of value 4.5 was reached at Year 2017
Minimum Number of visitors in millions about 2.67 was reached at Year 2010
